room_title: Escape room "Mystery Of The Red Dragon" by Amazing Escape Room in Los Angeles
room_description:
You are a team of Interpol Investigators hired by the Asian Art Museum to track down a priceless and ancient sculpture, The Red Dragon. It was mysteriously stolen in-route from Beijing to the Asian Art Museum in San Francisco.
A month of following clues has lead your team to the home of a Mr.Frederick Cromwell, an esteemed rare-antiques dealer who is suspected to have made millions stealing priceless artifacts. Infiltrate Mr.Cromwellâ€™s private residence, retrieve the stolen Red Dragon and escape undetected before he returns home in 60 minutes!
